title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.9 - Overloading and overspeeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-2.9 - Overloading and overspeeding

State Regulations

An amusement device shall not be overcrowded, or loaded
in excess of its safe carrying capacity; nor shall it be operated at an unsafe
speed or at any speed beyond that recommended by the
manufacturer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-2.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
